headline: Phlow Corp. Congratulates the Commonwealth of Virginia and the Virginia Innovation Partnership Corporation on a Historic Investment to Create the Nation’s Largest Workforce Development Center for Advanced Pharmaceutical Manufacturing

headline: ESMO 2025: Sichuan-Kelun moves in breast cancer ADC space

headline: Merck & Co. Inc. (MRK) Reports Solid Q3 with Strong Drug Sales and Pipeline Progress
summary: Merck & Co Inc. (NYSE:MRK) is one of the best stocks to invest in, according to billionaire D.E. Shaw. On October 30, Merck & Co Inc. (NYSE:MRK) posted third-quarter 2025 sales of $17.3 billion, up 4% from last year. KEYTRUDA led the way with $8.1 billion in sales, rising 10%. WINREVAIR saw a sharp jump […]
